Hi I'm a Front-End Developer

I Make Good Stuffs for The Web

I specialize in Front-End development on building exceptionally elegant websites that provides an easy experience for the users.

About me

Hello, I'm Jude Patrick Tejada, I am currently a Senior High School student studying in the Philippines who loves to take on challenges that pushes me outside of my comfort zone..



I like to immerse myself in UI/UX designs to improve my overall designing skills when I'm not coding to further help me create better experiences when building web applications.

Featured Projects

Fiddles

A web application that I made with plain JavaScript to help developers find new ideas for their next project.

Movie Library

A Web application made with plain JavaScript that can help you search and save your favorite movies, with provided details.

Findhub

A nicer profile for seeing your Github account, you can view your top languages and most starred in a visualized chart.
